node.text:
.
.
🧘‍♀️Gentle yoga is a great action you can take to send signals to your mind & body of safety.
.
❤This helps to reinstate the parasympathetic nervous system, counteract the causes of anxiety, reduce the stress hormones, increase oxygen & release tension. Plus it's a nice thing to do, this gets you off your phone &  reconnecting to things that matter.
.
🧎‍♂️Many people find joy in this practice, so give it a try & let us know how you found it, everyone is different!
.
😊Check out @maracimatoribus she has some great videos for you to try, see what works for you!

#anxiety #feelinganxious #action #yourcontrol #practice #interesing #new #try #anxietymanagement

node.text:
Myself and Pryianka @almaformula chat aboutweek 4 & 5 of the challenge, about foods & supplements. Corona virus. Some anxiety questions answered. relashionships & work anxiety.
.
IF you want to start join in on now or start from the beginning everything is documented in the highlights. 
.
see you next week😊
.
#wellbeing #immunity #anxiety #feelinganxious #counteract #causes = #anxietyprevention #feelingbetter

node.title: Week 4-5 of the 30-day Boost your wellbeing and immunity challenge plus+

node.text:
.
👍Both myself & Priyanka @almaformula have collaborated to bring you this challenge & we will both be taking part.
.
🤔We will be consciously working on what we are in control of : behaviours such as 
.
Daily habits
Food choices
Thought Management
Morning rituals
Reconnecting to nature
etc.

All these will impact our thoughts & feelings.
Reduce fear
Reduce anxiety
Boost wellbeing & immunity.
Win Win Win!
.
👉Each weekend we will go live for a Q & A. After the live, we will be posting up what you need, to be prepared for the week. (things you may already have or are very affordable to get) So that you don't arrive at one day and think "I am not ready" & then decide you can't join in. 
.
👉Each evening between 9pm French time we will be posting up what to do for the following day.
So that you know what to expect, as some of the activities are designed to be, as you wake up.
.
👉You can follow myself & @almaformula we will be doing the challenge ourselves & documenting this in our stories to give you two different perspectives from the challenge as well as your own. 
.
👉There will be links given as we go, for ideas, downloadables etc. as part of the challenge. 
.
👉If you are thinking you can't do this, it may be too long?
.
👉HERE'S a Helpful perception
Life sometimes happens, even myself, I may have a day when it's not possible to achieve that days activity, like too many urgent things may take over. That's fine & not a reason to beat myself up or decide I've failed, feel bad & the choose to not take part the next day. No i'll take the day I need & will be ready the next day.
.
👉Also this is a challenge to be taken with interest & discovery of self. To become aware of what behaviours we choose that may influence our thoughts & feelings. Not to tell ourselves off, but to know where we can make the first step.
.
👉We are in control of our behaviours & this will impact/influence on our though & feelings.
.
👉Up next is the shopping list.
👉Sunday 9pm gmt +1 Monday's challenge Will be posted.
👉Monday websites & links to what you need.
👉Everything will be saved in the highlights & IGTV for you to try at any time.
.
😊

node.title: Week 4 starts this Monday 9th of November.

node.text:
.
👍Join us on Monday the 19th of october. Both myself & Priyanka @almaformula have collaborated to bring you this challenge & we will both be taking part.
.
🤔We will be consciously working on what we are in control of : behaviours such as 
.
Daily habits
Food choices
Thought Management
Morning rituals
Reconnecting to nature
etc.

All these will impact our thoughts & feelings.
Reduce fear
Reduce anxiety
Boost wellbeing & immunity.
Win Win Win!
.
👉Each Saturday we will go live for a Q & A. After the live, we will be posting up what you need, to be prepared for the week. (things you may already have or are very affordable to get) So that you don't arrive at one day and think "I am not ready" & then decide you can't join in. 
.
👉Each evening between 9pm French time we will be posting up what to do for the following day.
So that you know what to expect, as some of the activities are designed to be, as you wake up.
.
👉You can follow myself & @almaformula we will be doing the challenge ourselves & documenting this in our stories to give you two different perspectives from the challenge as well as your own. 
.
👉There will be links given as we go, for ideas, downloadables etc. as part of the challenge. 
.
👉If you are thinking you can't do this, it may be too long?
.
👉HERE'S a Helpful perception
Life sometimes happens, even myself, I may have a day when it's not possible to achieve that days activity, like too many urgent things may take over. That's fine & not a reason to beat myself up or decide I've failed, feel bad & the choose to not take part the next day. No i'll take the day I need & will be ready the next day.
.
👉Also this is a challenge to be taken with interest & discovery of self. To become aware of what behaviours we choose that may influence our thoughts & feelings. Not to tell ourselves off, but to know where we can make the first step.
.
👉We are in control of our behaviours & this will impact/influence on our though & feelings.
.
👉Up next is the shopping list.
👉Sunday 9pm gmt +1 Monday's challenge Will be posted.
👉Monday websites & links to what you need.
👉Everything will be saved in the highlights & IGTV for you to try at any time.
.
😊

node.title: 30-day Boost your wellbeing and immunity challenge live week 2

node.text:
WHY Is it sometimes hard to find something grateful? It's normal if you find it hard, there is alot of uncertainty & new information everyday. causing us to feel anxious bit try not to let that stop you taking control of reconnecting to nice thoughts & nice feelings. now more than ever you need it. ❤
.
Watch this to help you.
.
#30daygratefulchallenge 📲for 30 days take a picture of something you have noticed cheered you up, no people.
Go to your stories
Add the picture 
and write on it using text.

#30daygratefulchallenge
TAG us @anxiety_wellbeing
.
Write what three things you found lifted your spirits that day.
look for the good.
.
Add a song to it, upbeat or calm.
.
Save it in your highlights
.
Start building your feel good library
.
The intention is not to impress but to show how the little things you already have really matter & bring good feelings.
.
You can go the highlights for some grateful inspiration. .
I look forward to seeing your tags 😊 I will spend one hour a day reposting your challenges. ❤
.
#anxiety #anxietycoach #positive #wellness #copingskills #emotionalmanagement #resilience #recovery #rejuvenate #wellness #selfhelp #selfhelper #cbt #support #feelgood #control

node.text:
📽@breathwrk 👍
.
There are many breathing excersises to try & are helpful in your body getting a full breath.
.
🏖It's a mini healing holiday, try practicing today & everyday. see how you feel in a weeks time.
.
WHAT IS box breathing?

Box breathing, also known as square breathing, is a technique used when taking slow, deep breaths. It can be a powerful stress reliever. It’s also called four-square breathing.

This technique can be beneficial to anyone, especially those who want to meditate or reduce stress. *You may find it particularly helpful if you have a lung disease such as chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). .
*words reposted from Wikipedia
.
.
🏖🏖🏖🏖🏖🏖🏖🏖🏖🏖🏖
#counteract
#stressresponse
#boxbreathing
#releasetension
#allowthoughtstopass
#takeabreak
#stressrelief
#miniholiday
#anxietycoach .

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by ⋒ Anxiety Management ℹ 1.2M+👥 on July 21, 2021 tagging @theopeninvite. May be an image of text that says 'ONE DAY YOU WILL TELL YOUR STORY OF HOW YOU'VE OVERCOME WHAT YOU ARE GOING THROUGH NOW, AND IT WILL BECOME PART OF SOMEONE ELSE'S SURVIVAL GUIDE. THEOPENINVITE THEOPENINVITE'.

node.text:
You need stories of 𝗵𝗼𝗽𝗲, because any fear causes anxiety, & if you want to feel less anxious this is helpful👇
.
🎨@theopeninvite
✒@anxiety_wellbeing 
.
Strange huh? That fear causes anxiety & anxiety causes fear.

Well you need fear because in an emergency you don't want to be stopping to have a cup of tea. But, because anxiety causes fear you can very easily become afraid of anxiety, hence why you feel stuck. There is a way out, contact me for coaching if you would like a hand but first.
.
In my 20's I had my second panic attack, first one wasn't that bad & I coped but the second, was too much.
.
I became afraid of everything, & I mean everything, outside, people, food, breathing, my thoughts, my body, going out, going down stairs, telling anyone, of hurting myself. Etc. 
.
I felt like an animal backed up in a cage, nothing was helping😔I contemplated what I would do to get out, with zero skills & a belief that I would feel this way forever, I had a couple for thoughts of how I could get out, leave this world. Lasted about a minute but I was too afraid to do that. Good job too.
.
It was the best thought I could of had because it made me realise that telling the doctor could not be as bad as this. Even if my fears were realised & they said I would need to go to a mental hospital (not a good rep in those days) it was still better than this!
.
You know what? My fear was not true
.
It took a process of talking, honesty.
A cbt therapist 
Leaning about anxiety, the mind, the body
Practice 
Emotional, spiritual help
Pushing through fears
Etc
.
It was a process I would never change because it has given me so much insight, insight you cannot by, or study. 
.
Enough to be able to help & guide others out of any anxiety circle & feeling more confident, grown, accepted, validated & with new skills. 
.
You can get out of a circle but you have to make the moves to do it, no matter how you  feel, look for help, if you feel you can't get it, try jot to let that thought stop you. It is possible. If you find you do not click with your medical doctor, look for another. If you dont know much about what anxiety is, stay open to all info. 
.
#anxietyhelp

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by ⋒ Anxiety Management ℹ 1.2M+👥 on July 20, 2021 tagging @powerofspeech. May be an image of 1 person and text that says 'YOUR MIND WILL ALWAYS BELIEVE EVERYTHING YOU TELL IT. IT HOPE FEED FEED IT FEED IT TRUTH. WITH LOVE. @POWEROFSPEECH hope trukh G'.

node.text:
Your environment is 𝗳𝗼𝗼𝗱 for your thoughts...👇
.
🎨@powerofspeech ❤
✒@anxiety_wellbeing
.
INFLUENCE
Is where many of your thoughts come from, where they get their energy.
Influence comes from your exterior, other peoples words, actions, behaviours, media, newspapers, social media, public image etc. 
THESE are our influences, where many of your ideas about yourself & life come from.
.
YOU CHOOSE 
We have a wonderful mind, where unconcious, subconcious & conscious thoughts shape our world, the way that we view it. 
Your unconcious & subconcuious are the thoughts that we tell ourselves everyday that we don't even question, they happen & we react.
Where did these come from, you? Well maybe, maybe a part of it is genetic, maybe a huge part is your environment from birth.
🤔What would have happened if your environment had been totally different? Would you have a different unconcious way of thinking? Of course you would.
.
CONSCIOUS YOU DECIDE
Whether you believe your thoughts are from your environment or genetically, you can learn to spot what they are saying & challenge them, if they are unhelpful ones to you, you can decide to change them, you can interupt & change your thought pattern as if you were in a completely helpful environment.
.
HOW?
Journal your thoughts 
Like myself at the beginning you may not even know that you are able to spot unconcious thoughts or that we even function this way.
You can learn
Write down your thoughts, when you feel uneasy, uncomfortable, anxious, upset, confused, angry etc.
Then what was happening at the time?
Where were you, who was there?
HOW you felt, which emotions came up.
What were you thinking?
Challenge it?
Is it true?
Is it the way you view it?
or the environment?
What is the evidence?
Is it helpful to you?
.
You may find thoughts that are not true. 
That a certain environment is a cause.
That people around you bring emotions within you up.
That these emotions are from the past, brought back frim a similar situation.
From here you can work on the future knowing a lot more about u without blame.
.
Blame blocks progress moving forward. 🤗
.
#anxietyhelp #anxietysupport #wellness #support #panic #gad #well-beingguide

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by ⋒ Anxiety Management ℹ 1.2M+👥 on July 19, 2021 tagging @branchesandbaublesco. May be an image of ‎text that says '‎AFFIRMATIONS TIONS FOR ANXIETY @BRANCHESANDBAUBLESCO i am safe comfortable my feelings are valid حو get through iwill i am loved supported this i am in control of my body‎'‎.

node.text:
Do you know 𝘄𝗵𝘆 these help when you actually try them?.👇
.
🎨@branchesandbaublesco 
✒@anxiety_wellbeing 
.
It's the difference between saftey & danger/emergency.
.
That difference comes from the thoughts that we choose to agree with, the signals from the body, or our environment.
.
For example if you say to yourself while feeling anxious.
.
🗣This is not normal
🗣I will panic
🗣Noone will get this, they will think I am crazy 
🗣This is never ending I am stuck
🗣There is nothing I can do i am having a major organ issue.
.
😱
1. The fear is mounting meaning 'danger' 
2. It is not true
3. But you may think it is. 

Some helpful perspectives.
.
👉Its normal to have these thoughts, it can feel awful at first & anxiety/panic is a mechanism to get you out of danger so you would need the fear to get you to escape, defend or stay. Whatever would be the best course for survival. 
👉You do get to choose what you believe. 
I think this isnt normal but I am responding
I am scared I will panic & that causes more panic.
I have seen many people are going through this too. 
I have seen & heard others that have been through this
These symptoms are fear & to survive an emergency.
.
👉But there is no emergency!
Yes but you can still think there is one & if your body is tense & laking a full breath, your body thinks that there's danger.
.
You get to choose if you want to practice these affirmations along with deep breaths and relaxing of tension. 
.
Why do they work, because they all mean 'safe'
& safe means no survival mechanism. If there is any fear, like 🗣this won't work. Then you get 'danger' again. 
.
#anxiety #anxietycoach #anxietyhelp #holistic #cbt
.
To help manage your thoughts you may need a hand. 
I coach 6 people every 5 week slots, I am fully booked until October. If you feel you need guidance to get out of an anxiety circle, (normal its not easy) email me for more details .🌱
📩anxiety.wellbeing.coach@gmail.com 
.
Emma
AW Coach

node.text:
Feeling an unpleasant 𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 is a normal response to something going on in your life. That could be .........👇
.
 🎨@dinosandcomics 
✒@anxiety_wellbeing 
.
Your environment
Your financial state
A past event that feels like it is present
A learnt unhelpful through pattern or behaviour
Fear 
Body symptoms from causes that respond with feeling tired, pain, restlessness, anxious.
Causing you to beleive the worst
Thinking you have no solution, helpless.
Etc
.
THE MIND & BODY RESPONDS TO THIS.
So if you are feeling something its normal & needs to have the space to be accepted in order for it to move though you, & most people that you meet will not know half of this, because we cannot read minds & cannot see your history by looking at you.
.
They may try to guess but thats because they want to help you, not even realising that its a long story & thye cannot possible know it all.
.
Also you may not know what has been happening either, sounds strange but I had been conditioned growing up to think everyone & everything was normal so I didn't even realise I was responding to that fact that it wasn't.
.
It takes a path to self awareness & openess to start to heal, but when someone just listen & you allow yourself to be with no judgement, the magic begins.
.
❤
.
#anxiety #human #anxietyhelp #anxietytips #anxietysupport #anxietytools #mindset #talk #listen #allow #accept #emotion #energyinmotion

user.full_name: ≫≫M▲ Y B E L L ⊕ E E Q U ▲ Y≪≪

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by ⋒ Anxiety Management ℹ 1.2M+👥 on July 16, 2021 tagging @maybell.eequay. May be an image of text that says '@MAYBELL.EEQUAY @MAYBEL EQUAY WHATEVER YOU GET DONE TODAY IS ENOUGH'.

node.text:
It's not time to 𝗱𝗼𝘂𝗯𝘁 yourself, it's time to ooo.........👇
.
🎨@maybell.eequay
✒@anxiety_wellbeing 
.
Congratulate all that you have done, 
.
I'll give you mine
This week
I worked and did my best, my clients are happy & seeing progress ❤
I cooked for myself
I organised some healthy meals
I cleaned the bathroom
I switched off of news (always do)
I made time for a few friends
I kept my boundaries whilst keeping it polite but firm
I had a daily rest
I made time for joy. The things I like
I was helpful & kind, I cat sat for a mate
I didn't beat myself up because everything I would have liked to do was not done because I may have over to-do'd my list. My bag, i need to put less on the to -do & to -be. 
One morning I needed rest & just did it, I had things to do but I did them later. 
I tried meditation & kept a morning routine
I have focused more on healthy, than telling my self the things I dont want.
.
I Congratulate myself. Well done chick, enjoy this time 😊Whatever you did or didn't do it is enough. 
.
Now, I would love to be a toadstool with high heeled boots on, looks fun. Give me some colour & music.❤
.
How will you Congratulate your efforts this week? Enjoy yourself?
.
#anxietycoach #anxietyhelp #tips #connection #congratulate #enjoy #love #learning

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by ⋒ Anxiety Management ℹ 1.2M+👥 on July 15, 2021 tagging @allontheboard. May be an image of text.

node.text:
I FEEL. MY 𝗵𝘂𝗺𝗮𝗻 way of processing my thoughts, environment, inside & out. The process is real, it's normal. Try not to put yourself down, focus too much on them or make a decision based on the feels.👇
.
🎨@allontheboard
✒@anxiety_wellbeing
.
WE'RE ALL NORMAL.
What's getting more & more not normal is our balance of lives. Living in a society not helpful to the human race, but more & more made for consumption.
.
If you are feeling low, upset, anxious etc. Try not to tell yourself off.
Try to relook at the ideas & beliefs that have been taught to you, that arnt for the human being. Are they true?
.
Like👉THE PERFECT 
human, house, bank acc, lifestyle, clothes, garden, party, job, status.etc. 
Perfection is an expectation that usually is unobtainable & even if you do obtain it, how long before you're seeking the next perfection challenge? 
Perfection is not where fullfilmemt lives, great expectations is where stress lives.
.
What really matters is all people👦🏻👧🏼👨👩🏽👴👵🏿, all animals🐶🐅🐮🐏🐎 & our home🌎
.
That you are well & thriving
That your house feels like a home, welcoming, safe.
That your bank acc has enough to live.
That your lifestyle includes good connections, a balance of movement, kindness, healthy food, silent reflection, purpose etc.
That your clothes fit & are what you need.
That your garden is inviting & a haven for nature for you to nurture & enjoy.
That your job is fulfilling, helpful, kind.
.
Ditch the unhelpful man made labels, that we assign to ourselves & others, then start to live out of these, think & act like it=more of the same feels. Then start deciding your actions based on the feelings.
Anxious
Depressed
Rich💲
Poor📈
Stupid
Etc

TRY
helpful labels :You can try a label with some purpose, a fresh perspective
Not my feelings
Always Growing/learning 
Capable
Kind
Open
Patient
Loving
GRATEFUL
Volunteer
Understanding
Etc.
.
I feel, you feel, we all feel, were human, don't allow the big society of media/consumption to feed you beliefs that's you're flawed, or broken, you're responding to your environment😍its normal to feel, you're allowed to validate, & look for change. #human
.
#anxietyhelp #anxietycoach #wellbeing #cbt

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by ⋒ Anxiety Management ℹ 1.2M+👥 on July 14, 2021 tagging @lucialitman. May be an image of text that says 'WHAT YOU THINK OF YOURSELF IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN WHAT OTHERS THINK OF YOU'.

node.text:
People could tell 𝘆𝗼𝘂 time & time again what they think is great about you BUT if you dont believe it, you won't feel it. You'll feel like the belief you have subscribed to👇
.
🎨@lucialitman
✒@anxiety_wellbeing 
.
🗣You looked lovely today 😍 
💭No I feel fat🙁
.
🗣Well done what a great effort & achievement🌞
💭No I feel I completely fluked that & I am not worthy of praise.😔
.
🗣You are more than capable of achieving your dreams i see great potential 👍
💭No am not i will fail.😔
.
🗣You are in need of a hand to get to grips on how you are feeling, you can get help, Its not you its the causes & you are in need of help with them. Like learning how, & solutions, gaining skills you have not been exposed to yet.🙌 I see hope.
💭No I am anxiety, this is me, I am depressed, this is me, I am not capable, its helpless, me too.🙁
.
Heres the thing, those thoughts exist so fighting them doesn't work, it actually causes more of the same, because to fight them means that its wrong to be there & you will feel scared by that, fear causes anxiety.
Its not wrong, they are there for a reason, they were put there, by other peopes options or the way you read their actions or words.

Example
🗣You can do better. 
This person meant you have done great & I see that you could add so much to this knowledge you can do it.
But they didn't say all that they said
🗣you can do better.
How would you perceive that be.
⚠️💭ah that wasn't enough
⚠️💭 I've messed up
⚠️💭 I've failed.
Or
🌱💭They beleive in me 
.
Once you have decided what it meant, you start to carry this meaning assigned by you.
Either 
⚠️I am not enough or 
🌱I have potential.
.
You choose what it means to you at the time.
.
Whichever one you subscribe to will be the driver of your actions.
.
⚠️don't try you'll fail
🌱I can do this.
.
How do you make a change, subscribed to another?
.
You can, but you need more info, knowledge, a hand, an oppeness to learn & to act whether your afraid or unsure. You need validation & to know you are not broken, you work very well, the mind & body has not failed you. Its about having access to skills, so that you know how, instead of feeling helpless.
.
You can. 
#cbt
#anxietyhelp
#coach

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by ⋒ Anxiety Management ℹ 1.2M+👥 on July 13, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'The problem in my head The problem in real life'.

node.text:
TEST the 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗼𝗿𝘆,  Remember a time when that problem seemed huge? Seem so big now? 
.
🎨@If you know the artist? 📩 
✒@anxiety_wellbeing
.
BIG
We must never belittle that big feeling we experience when a problem seems massive, you are feeling it, those feelings exist & can feel very uncomfortable, emotional, overwhelming but what we can do is look at the way we THINK about it, let the emotion out, accept that it has brought you these emotions & that's normal.
.
THINK
It's true that when something happens, we get news, there are problems, they can sometimes be coming at you all at once, it's part of life, being human.
.
THOSE DAYS
That happen to everyone, the car broke, youre feeling Ill too, the news on tv is terrible today, the bus, train is late now youre late, you have worries, money, people, relationships, change, grief, health, life, confidence, food, love, no time..& on & on.
.
All at once in your head it's too much, how can you possibly tackle them all? Are they all true? Around & around they will get bigger & bigger! Stressful, anxious.
.
IT FEELS BIG BUT
There are some things you can do.
Make it manageable & help yourself through this time.
Write this stuff down 
Onto paper & out of your head
Sort out what is definatly true, facts or assumptions?
What things can you do something about?
What can you do about them? However big the challenge chop it up into manageable bite size chunks
What things are completely out of your control?
*scrub these out, kiss goodbye to them, worry solves ZILCH NADA RIEN NOTHING! 
You are allowed to let it go.
*Everytime those pop back in your head tell them 'i can't help You, see ya' & refocus on what you are doing.
Turn the news off.
Take some deep breaths today, lots of mini stop breaks, enable you to cope better, less overwhelmed like mini🏖
Talk about your day. 
Try gratefulness three things that bring a smile, some fun memories, a music track that lifts you.
You don't have to deal with all these things in one go, in your head.
Today can still be a joyful day.
.
REMEMBER
You've probably had similar times when it all went pear shaped in one day & you got thought it, this will be one of those times too.
.
#anxietyhelp #

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by ⋒ Anxiety Management ℹ 1.2M+👥 on July 12, 2021 tagging @happinessproject. May be a cartoon of text that says 'are you okay?'.

node.text:
Sometimes we 𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗱 someone to just be there, no fixing just present. Connection is a human need. I find more & more people saying..👇
.
🎨@happinessproject 
✒@anxiety_wellbeing 
.
🗣I've got people to do stuff with but feel I've got noone to do nothing with'. As if there needs to be a defined purpose to get together🙁
.
This idea may have come about from our community's moving further & further apart.
.
We used to live mainly on the ground together in streets, we knew our neighbours this way, looked out for eachother naturally because you can see them. Now many of us live in high rises. Do you see your neighbours & chat much? Do you know the people in your street/building? 
.
This is isolating.
.
We feel that we must arrange a day to see people, like just hanging out is no good. 
.
We don't feel we can say how we feel because it doesn't fall into, let's do something.
.
Many of us prefer to communicate via social media than face2face, we are loosing the skill, believing that means we are introvert & incapable of extrovercy. Then feeling bad about it. Believing we are now lacking. 
.
But I believe that with less practice of something comes a disconnect, doesn't mean you are not this or that, more like your out of practice & in need to build those skills again.
.
These are just some things I've noticed that have contributed to us feeling like this. There are somethings you can do to change this.
.
If someone says how are you, tell them about your week. "It was nice to just talk, how was yours?"
.
Getting together can be simple, a walk, watch something together, cook, exercise, keep conversations open.
.
If you feel there is noone, you are in need of finding your tribe, people with some similar interests, ideas, etc. There is nothing wrong with you, keep looking for them. To make friends & connections.
.
They are out there, get online to find them in or near your area, clubs, meet up groups. Where you meet in person, no matter what your thoughts/doubts are saying, like 'I can't' 'they won't like me' try not to decide based on doubt. These are guesses that stop you finding your tribe❤
.
Set phone boundaries, allow yourself to be present with others.
.
#anxietyhelp

node.text:
Take the pressure off of yourself & others. Release the expectations you think should be of yourself & others.
.
🎨@oliviaherrickdesign ❤
.
Today let go, slow down, take time to breathe.
You matter, your body & mind have a need to just be, and the people around you need it too. Those adopted expectations are the reason you feel you can't let go, but you can.
.
#anxiety #cause #unhelpful #expectations #passedon from #peers #society #youdecide
